item.title: IACとPwC：米国のデジタル広告収入は2022年に前年比10.8％増の2097億ドル、2021年の同35％から減少、ソーシャルメディア広告収入は2022年に前年比3.6％増、39.3％から減少（Megan Graham/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Megan Graham / Wall Street Journal:
IAC and PwC: US digital ad revenue rose 10.8% YoY to $209.7B in 2022, down from 35% YoY in 2021; social media ad revenue rose 3.6% YoY in 2022, down from 39.3%  —  Headwinds from the economy and privacy protections were offset by growth in areas such as retail ad networks and streaming TV, executives and analysts say

item.title: HBOマックスがマックスになると発表したワーナー・ブラザース・ディスカバリーの株価は12日に5.83％下落、ディズニーは2.47％下落、パラマウントは3.28％下落、Netflixは2.12％下落（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）。
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
Warner Bros. Discovery's stock fell 5.83% on April 12 after announcing HBO Max would become Max; Disney fell 2.47%, Paramount fell 3.28%, and Netflix fell 2.12%  —  WB Discovery shares have been battered over the past year as the company dealt with post-merger cost-cutting and management realignment.

item.title: Vox MediaがNowThisを独立会社としてスピンオフ、アウトレット買収から1年以上、少数株主となり、NowThisの広告販売を継続する予定（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Vox Media spins off NowThis as an independent company, over a year after acquiring the outlet, takes a minority stake, and plans to keep selling ads for NowThis  —  Known for its viral videos of politicians and other newsmakers, NowThis is preparing to cover the 2024 election as an independent company.

item.title: Fox Newsは、2023年8月にミルウォーキーで開催される予定の2024年共和党大統領予備選を初めて主催する予定で、RNCはRumbleで討論会をライブ配信する（Max Greenwood/The Hill）。
item.description:
Max Greenwood / The Hill:
Fox News plans to host the first 2024 Republican presidential primary, set to be held in Milwaukee in August 2023; the RNC will live stream the debate on Rumble  —  Fox News will host the first Republican presidential primary debate in Milwaukee later this year, Republican National Committee Chair Ronna McDaniel announced on Wednesday.

item.title: NPRは、NPRが編集的に独立していないとほのめかすことによって、プラットフォームが「我々の信頼性を損なう行動」を取った後、「もはやTwitterで活動しない」ことを決定した（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
NPR decides to “no longer be active on Twitter” after the platform took “actions that undermine our credibility” by implying NPR is not editorially independent  —  The broadcaster said that the label undermined its credibility “by falsely implying that we are not editorially independent.”

item.title: ロシアの記者、学者、プログラマー、データベース専門家が、13のアウトレットを備え、70以上のアウトレットを目指す「ロシア独立メディアアーカイブ」を立ち上げる（Erin Ailworth/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Erin Ailworth / Wall Street Journal:
Russian reporters, scholars, programmers, and database specialists launch the Russian Independent Media Archive, which features 13 outlets and is aiming for 70+  —  Partnership between PEN America, Bard College comes as WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich remains imprisoned in Russia

item.title: 2017年に腐敗した捜査の末に暗殺されたジャーナリスト、ミロスラバ・ブリーチ・ヴェルデセアの解決に向けて、30人以上のメキシコ人記者による集団の活動を紹介する（Melissa del Bosque/New Yorker）。
item.description:
Melissa del Bosque / New Yorker:
A look at the work by a collective of 30+ Mexican reporters to solve journalist Miroslava Breach Velducea's assassination in 2017 after a corrupt investigation  —  After the death of a reporter who investigated narcopolitics, her colleagues formed a secret collective to bring the killers to justice—and challenge a culture of impunity.

item.title: ガーディアンUSは、サイモン＆シュスターの元出版社であるダナ・カネディを編集長に迎え、ベッツィ・リード編集長に報告する（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
The Guardian US names Dana Canedy, the former publisher of Simon & Schuster, as managing editor, reporting to Editor-in-Chief Betsy Reed  —  Ms. Canedy, the first Black woman to serve as the publisher of Simon & Schuster's flagship imprint, will oversee the newsroom's daily operations.
